title: rahulzx
author: rahulzx
content: Guys are you actually think TikTok is time wasting app? Has it only just negetiveside?

comments.author: DeathAngel
comments.body: I think the youngsters enjoy it, it helps some businesses do well but I am far too old for that kind of stuff. Nobody wants to see a dude in his 40’s dancing around like a teenage girl.Obviously everybody can do what they want, free speech etc but it is definitely not for me.

comments.author: rodskee
comments.body: at first it is enjoyable , but as time goes by? it is completely a waste of time because all of the videos are BS and nothing in related truly .

comments.author: Psalms23
comments.body: Quote from: rahulzx on February 24, 2023, 07:55:10 PMGuys are you actually think TikTok is time wasting app? Has it only just negetiveside?Actually, its not really a waste of time. A lot of my friends are earning from TikTok through shops affiliate. You just have to have at least 1k followers, and then you can apply for shops affiliate and earn through commission.

comments.author: rachael9385
comments.body: Quote from: Car22 on February 26, 2023, 05:30:01 AMYes of course  wastage of time You falsehood bro. TikTok is not a waste of time media, it helps to relieve thinking and crater, people once said, all work without play makes Jack not trendy. If you are stressed out and you visit your TikTok app you watch one or two comedies you will smile.

comments.author: Qiubell5
comments.body: depending on someone using it. on tiktok there is also video content about knowledge, as well as motivation to try and enthusiasm. but on tiktok there is also video content that is not useful, which is just a waste of time. so it all depends on how people use it.

comments.author: devil-soul
comments.body: Yes it's a waste of time tiktok but pleasant I would say more of a pastime

comments.author: rahulzx
comments.body: Quote from: Psalms23 on February 27, 2023, 07:31:51 AMQuote from: rahulzx on February 24, 2023, 07:55:10 PMGuys are you actually think TikTok is time wasting app? Has it only just negetiveside?Actually, its not really a waste of time. A lot of my friends are earning from TikTok through shops affiliate. You just have to have at least 1k followers, and then you can apply for shops affiliate and earn through commission.good to see atleast you have such friends , most are not

comments.author: BenCodie
comments.body: Quote from: rachael9385 on February 27, 2023, 07:51:00 AMQuote from: Car22 on February 26, 2023, 05:30:01 AMYes of course  wastage of time You falsehood bro. TikTok is not a waste of time media, it helps to relieve thinking and crater, people once said, all work without play makes Jack not trendy. If you are stressed out and you visit your TikTok app you watch one or two comedies you will smile. What a sad world. Where people now consider scrolling through worthless 5-10 second videos as "play". Quote from: Psalms23 on February 27, 2023, 07:31:51 AMQuote from: rahulzx on February 24, 2023, 07:55:10 PMGuys are you actually think TikTok is time wasting app? Has it only just negetiveside?Actually, its not really a waste of time. A lot of my friends are earning from TikTok through shops affiliate. You just have to have at least 1k followers, and then you can apply for shops affiliate and earn through commission.If you're not using it to earn, it is undeniably a waste of time...or at least, the quality of time spent is low at best in comparison to basically anything else that is considered remotely constructive.

comments.author: Raceonsucced
comments.body: If you only watch videos on TikTok for fun over a long period of time, it's probably a waste. But no, if you use TikTok for your business needs.

comments.author: soap94
comments.created_time: March 03, 2023, 08:27:38 PMLast edit: March 04, 2023, 12:46:23 PM by soap94
comments.body: Well yeah, at some point it's time waste. Especially considering that you're not learning anything, just scrolling through the feed. I was mad when my son used to play Minecraft but now I realize this game isn't that bad at all hahaThat's exactly the reason I prefer gaming to TikTok and social medias in general. Plus, websites like this https://modscraft.net/en/mods/ allow you to build community around topics (ex Minecraft)

comments.author: mich
comments.body: I like TikTok, like all social media there are endless funny videos. But I think it’s not a good idea for kids to be on it even with TikTok’s terms of age thirteen and above. There’s that thought when your child is viewed by the public and there is that feeling when there are pedophiles out there. I do not like to spend too much time on social media because of the health of my eyes. Not just funny videos there are how to videos, news around a certain neighborhood, and even challenges. In all, TikTok is a good form of short-term entertainment but not for kids.

comments.author: OGsmall
comments.body: TikTok is a good app I enjoy it very much one can find good updates for news and tell you it is not a waste of time mate more friends you come to find in it

comments.author: Nosan
comments.body: All in all, I think it's really a waste of time, just like all social networks.

comments.author: Vadors
comments.body: You can not say that all very bad but sometimes come across and useful videos, but they are few, in general a waste of time

comments.author: morggin
comments.body: TikTok is owned by its parent company, ByteDance. And though the Chinese government doesn't directly own the social media platform, it may indirectly influence its operations.  So keep that in mind.  You almost certainly have the CCP intruding into your personal device and all of your affairs.

comments.author: Myraly
comments.body: Once I uninstalled that app, there was a lot more time!

comments.author: Farian
comments.body: Personally, tiktok does not interfere with my life in any way

comments.author: Mikhalina Palaha
comments.body: I think that the answer to whether TikTok is a time-wasting app or not is a bit more complex than a simple "yes" or "no." In my opinion, it really depends on how a person uses the app and how much time they spend on it.So, TikTok can certainly be a time-waster if someone spends hours upon hours scrolling through videos without any real purpose or intention. However, on the other hand, TikTok can also be a source of entertainment, education, and creativity for users who use it with intention and purpose.
